1ã€é…ç½®ymlæ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

port: 8082

spring:

password: 12345678

# æ›´æ–°æˆ–è€…åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®è¡¨ç»“æ„
ddl-auto: update
# æ§åˆ¶å°æ˜¾ç¤ºSQL
show-sql: true

2ã€å†™Entityï¼š
@Entity
public class Users {

@Id
@GeneratedValue(strategy=GenerationType.AUTO)
private Integer id;
private String username;
private String password;
private Date lastLoginTime;
private String userRole;

// getter&setteræ–¹æ³•çœç•¥

}

3ã€å†™Repositoryï¼š
// ç»§æ‰¿JpaRepositoryæ¥å®Œæˆå¯¹æ•°æ®åº“çš„æ“ä½œ
public interface UsersRepository extends JpaRepository<Users, Integer> {

Users getUsersById(Integer id);

List<Users> findAllByUserRole(String userRole);

}

4ã€å†™Controllerï¼š
@Controller
public class LoginController {

@Autowired
UsersRepository usersRepository;

@ResponseBody
@GetMapping("/getTotal")
public long getTotal(){
    return usersRepository.count();
}

@ResponseBody
@GetMapping("/getAll")
public List<Users> getAll() {
    return usersRepository.findAll();
}

@ResponseBody
@GetMapping("/getUsersById/{id}")
public Users getUsersById(@PathVariable("id") Integer id) {
    System.out.println(id);
    Users users = usersRepository.getUsersById(id);
    return users;
}

@ResponseBody
@GetMapping("/findAllByUserRole/{userRole}")
public List<Users> findAllByUserRole(@PathVariable("userRole") String userRole) {
    System.out.println(userRole);
    List<Users> users = usersRepository.findAllByUserRole(userRole);
    return users;
}

}
